name: Solitaire Blitz: Win Cash
description:
Solitaire Blitz brings exciting multiplayer gameplay to the perennial Klondike Classic!

Zen out testing your skills in practice mode or play competitive matches live against other players for fun and prizes. Discover power-ups and other premium features to spice up the classic gameplay and give yourself an edge.

Get ready to experience Klondike Solitaire with smooth game controls, a classy look, and quirky and fun twists.

If you're a fan of testing yourself competitively in skill-based games like Bingo, Solitaire, and Rummy, then you're going to love what Solitaire Blitz has to offer!

WHAT WE OFFER
- Classic, smooth Solitaire gameplay
- Real Time PvP and Tournaments
- Power ups in gameplay for excitement
- Bonus points for Speed
- Real Money Prizes
- Skill based Matchmaking

If you have any questions, please reach out at help@onjoyride.com.
